mapper.select: SELECT D.DONATION_ID donationId, D.USER_ID userId, D.DONATION_DATE donationDate, D.DONATION_MATCHING_STATE donationMatchingState, D.DONATION_ALBUM_QUANTITY donationAlbumQuantity, D.ALBUM_ID albumId, D.DONATION_CONTENT donationContent, A.ALBUM_ID AS "album.albumId", A.ALBUM_NAME AS "album.albumName", A.ARTIST AS "album.artist", A.COVER AS "album.cover" FROM DONATION D, ALBUM A WHERE D.DONATION_ID = #{donationId} AND D.ALBUM_ID = A.ALBUM_ID

SELECT D.DONATION_ID donationId, D.USER_ID userId, D.DONATION_DATE donationDate, D.DONATION_MATCHING_STATE donationMatchingState, D.DONATION_ALBUM_QUANTITY donationAlbumQuantity, D.ALBUM_ID albumId, D.DONATION_CONTENT donationContent, A.ALBUM_ID AS "album.albumId", A.ALBUM_NAME AS "album.albumName", A.ARTIST AS "album.artist", A.COVER AS "album.cover" FROM DONATION D, ALBUM A WHERE D.ALBUM_ID = A.ALBUM_ID ORDER BY D.DONATION_DATE DESC

SELECT D.DONATION_ID donationId, D.USER_ID userId, D.DONATION_DATE donationDate, D.DONATION_MATCHING_STATE donationMatchingState, D.DONATION_ALBUM_QUANTITY donationAlbumQuantity, D.ALBUM_ID albumId, D.DONATION_CONTENT donationContent, A.ALBUM_ID AS "album.albumId", A.ALBUM_NAME AS "album.albumName", A.ARTIST AS "album.artist", A.COVER AS "album.cover" FROM DONATION D, ALBUM A WHERE D.USER_ID = #{userId} AND D.ALBUM_ID = A.ALBUM_ID ORDER BY D.DONATION_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DONATION (DONATION_ID, USER_ID, DONATION_DATE, DONATION_MATCHING_STATE, ALBUM_ID, DONATION_ALBUM_QUANTITY, DONATION_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_DONATION.NEXTVAL, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{donationDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{donationMatchingState, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{albumId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{donationAlbumQuantity, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{donationContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
